entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
